definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: But those whom Christ commends know not that they have been ministering unto Him.
sentences.chinese: 但是基督所称扬的那些人并不知道自己曾经帮助过他。

sentences.english: The First Edition was widely praised for its readability, and that emphasis is retained.
sentences.chinese: 初版广泛因它的易读性而被称扬，并且重点被保留。

sentences.english: The report has yet to be confirmed, though rumors that Young has passed a physical for United have also surfaced.
sentences.chinese: 交易尚待确认，尽管有传言称扬已经去曼联体检了。

sentences.english: And he taught in their synagogues, and was magnified by all.
sentences.chinese: 他在他们的会堂内施教，受到众人的称扬。

sentences.english: The holy Church throughout all the world doth acknowledge thee;
sentences.chinese: 全球各地的神圣教会，一起称扬你。

sentences.english: I will lift up the cup of salvation and call on the name of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 我要举起救恩的杯，称扬耶和华的名。

sentences.english: Widows and orphans were exalting the name of Jesus for His works of mercy to them.
sentences.chinese: 孤儿寡妇因耶稣向他们所施的仁慈而称扬他的名。

sentences.english: The soldier's brave deeds brought him honor and glory.
sentences.chinese: 兵士的英勇事迹为他带来了荣耀和称扬。

sentences.english: All the powers of the Lord, bless the Lord, praise and exalt him for ever.
sentences.chinese: 上主的军旅，请赞美上主，歌颂称扬他，直到永远。

sentences.english: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 我要举起救恩的杯，称扬耶和华的名。

definition: World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
to sing the praises of/to extol/to eulogize
